title: Bug 24407[Preferences] cannot remove file association from Workbench preferences
description: I added a file association into Window / Preferences / Workbench / FileAssociation , which worked fine. Then I tried to remove the new file extension,using the "Remove" button. It seems to remove it from the list OK, but thechange is not being persisted. When I close out the preferences dialog, andthen open it back up, the deleted file extension comes back.I am using the M1 build dated 09202002.
